maml:description.maml:para: Creates enrypted password file

maml:description.maml:para: Get password from encrypted password file
Read password from encrypted file Encryption key is based on windows user security token of logged on user when file was created

maml:alert.maml:para: This cmdlet is used allow the use of basic authentication and persist authentication info
